meanings.definition: Written by more than one author.
meanings.sent1: The multiauthored book featured contributions from various writers.
meanings.sent2: The research paper was multiauthored, showcasing the collaboration of different authors.
meanings.sent3: The multiauthored novel had so many writers, it was like a literary potluck!
meanings.sent4: The multiauthored article was a symphony of diverse voices coming together.
meanings.sent5: The multiauthored project was a tapestry woven with the threads of many authors.

meanings.sent1: The multiauthored study presented findings from various researchers.
meanings.sent2: The anthology was multiauthored, reflecting the collaboration of many writers.
meanings.sent3: The multiauthored screenplay was like a puzzle put together by different minds.
meanings.sent4: The multiauthored project was a mosaic of ideas contributed by numerous authors.
meanings.sent5: The multiauthored report was a chorus of voices harmonizing their perspectives.
